# Date and venue of 2024 workshop

The workshop will take place 11-13th September 2024 again in the beautiful [Biozentrum](https://www.biozentrum.unibas.ch/) in [Basel](https://www.basel.com/en).

# 2024 ASA Biopharmaceutical Section Regulatory-Industry Statistics Workshop 

The 2024 ASA Biopharmaceutical Section Regulatory-Industry Statistics Workshop will take place 25-27th September 2024 in Rockville, MD.
